events.message: I am reporting a car accident that occurred yesterday afternoon at the intersection on Main Street involving my vehicle and another car.
The claim has been reviewed and categorised under auto accident due to the nature of the collision involving two vehicles.
An insurance agent has been assigned to your case to assist with the vehicle damage assessment and claim process.
We have officially acknowledged your claim and have started processing it to ensure timely assistance.
Please submit photos of the vehicle damage and the police report to support your auto accident claim.
The requested police report and multiple images of the accident damage were submitted promptly for review.
An investigation into the circumstances of the collision has begun, including witness statements and vehicle inspections.
The investigation is complete, confirming fault and assessing the total damage sustained by the vehicle.
A fair settlement offer has been proposed based on repair estimates and policy coverage limits.
The claimant provided feedback indicating satisfaction with the responsiveness shown during the claim process.
Your claim has been approved in full, allowing us to proceed with issuing payment for the repair costs.
The payment for the approved claim amount was processed successfully and should reach your account shortly.
The claim has been formally closed after successful payment disbursement and resolution of all outstanding issues.
